#summary Joins data with a BIG Bed/Wig file

Joins data with a BIG Bed[http://genome.ucsc.edu/FAQ/FAQformat.html#format1.5]/Wig[http://genome.ucsc.edu/FAQ/FAQformat.html#format6.1] file. 

= Parameters =


  * *CHROM* : The VCF CHROM column
  * *POS* : The VCF POS column (first base is '1')
  * *Wig URI* : URI of the WIG[https://cgwb.nci.nih.gov/goldenPath/help/wiggle.html] (possibly gzipped or bgzipped); Eitheir fixed or variable intervals.
  * *Column-name* : New Column name

= Input =


  * *In-Port 1* : Input


= Output =


  * *out* : Output
